import Head from 'next/head' import Image from 'next/image' import Content from '../content/pages.js'; import Button from '../components/Button'; import CarouselSpecialties from '../components/CarouselSpecialties'; import toParagraph from '../utils/paragraphFormatter'; import remark, { process } from 'remark'; import markdown from 'remark-parse'; import html from 'remark-html' import style from '../styles/Home.module.scss'; import fetchUser from '../utils/fetchUser'; import fetchStaticPage from '../utils/fetchStaticPages' const HomeContent = Content.pages.home; const userData = fetchUser(); const pageData = fetchStaticPage('home'); const banerTitle = pageData.banner.title; const Home = () => { return ( <>

{HomeContent.textSection.title}

{HomeContent.textSection.text}

{HomeContent.specialtiesSection.title}

{HomeContent.calculatorSection.title}

{HomeContent.presentationSection.title}

{presentationTextRaw}

) } export default Home;
